protein.specific_function: Catalyzes the formation of S-adenosylmethionine from methionine and ATP.

go_class.description: transferase activity, transferring alkyl or aryl (other than methyl) groups

reference.reference_text: Horikawa S, Tsukada K: Molecular cloning and developmental expression of a human kidney S-adenosylmethionine synthetase. FEBS Lett. 1992 Nov 2;312(1):37-41.
